content:
Deepak will be giving a Pangeo Showcase presentation next Wednesday at 10a MT on recent updates to Xarray's GroupBy! More info here.

I believe these are generally recorded as well if you're interested, but can't make it.

The Pangeo Showcase this afternoon (2-3p MT) will be on Arkouda, a new Xarray backend for HPC workflows.

More info here: Arkouda as an XArray backend for HPC

You can find prior Pangeo Showcase presentation recordings (including the Xarray GroupBy one) here: https://www.youtube.com/@pangeo2060/videos
